commit.message:
Referral code refactor/fixes (#4277)

* display message when there is no active campaign

* prettier

* bug fix

* disable the autopass

* translate the conrtents

* re-set the autopass

* handle when there is no active growth campaign

* improve link

* correct the attestation account id

* separate growth referral code creation logic into a separate package

* fix referral creation on notifications side

* prettify

* fix lint problem

* prettify

* prettify

* undo mistake

* fix typo

* undoing change

* move utils functionality to growth-shared

* remove desktop invite code length restriction

* minor fixes

Co-authored-by: Shahul Hameed <shahthepro@gmail.com>
